TopicTitle: Apollo Mission Recreation (And More!) [Requesting Ground Crew Aid!]

Articles.Content:
[quote name='adsii1970']Ok, sounds good to me. Now since we have the PROGRAM patch, here is the first mission patch based on this design. As long as names are not too long, they can be added to this patch.

[CENTER][url]http://i.imgur.com/HBc5L0J.png?1[/url] [url]http://i.imgur.com/POlRfa3.png?1[/url][/CENTER]

And here are a few of the goodies I mentioned in a previous post in this thread:

[url]http://i.imgur.com/GpleGoS.png?1[/url] For those who are members of the Flight Crew. (The patch area can be changed to represent current mission patch)

[url]http://i.imgur.com/BHEeYC5.png?1[/url] For those who are members of Mission Control.

[url]http://i.imgur.com/fOCsCJu.png?1[/url] For those (I believe I saw one) who is part of the promotional team.[/QUOTE]

I LOVE THEM!!! I will add these to my sig the second I get home! Ha- these are amazing.

[quote name='ZooNamedGames']I LOVE THEM!!! I will add these to my sig the second I get home! Ha- these are amazing.[/QUOTE]

Not a problem. Did I happen to mention I did graphic designing for the Boy Scouts, our church, and a collection of other organizations for a while?

Now having the Apollo Recreation Project logo created and the first mission patch based off it, it will make future missions a little easier. And no, not going to do the same patch with a different Roman numeral, but unique logos for each mission to give it the NASA feel. Might dedicate a posting in this thread to the INSIGNIA OF THE APOLLO RECREATION PROJECT, and include each logo and a description of the evolution. What are your thoughts?

No, isn't this one more for your signature: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OHX2n5O.png?1[/IMG] Edited November 19, 2015 by adsii1970

[quote name='ZooNamedGames']At 2pm on Friday we send a spam of requests to Kasper and it should work. But also spam Scott Manley's twitter with a tweet I will make (I will link my twitter).[/QUOTE]

oh, I don't have twitter :blush:
I can try and gain support during squadcast tommorow i guess...

so no help needed with ship making I take?

[quote name='adsii1970']Not a problem. Did I happen to mention I did graphic designing for the Boy Scouts, our church, and a collection of other organizations for a while?

Now having the Apollo Recreation Project logo created and the first mission patch based off it, it will make future missions a little easier. And no, not going to do the same patch with a different Roman numeral, but unique logos for each mission to give it the NASA feel. Might dedicate a posting in this thread to the INSIGNIA OF THE APOLLO RECREATION PROJECT, and include each logo and a description of the evolution. What are your thoughts?[/QUOTE]

I think you might have.

Yeah I'd like something to put on the OP, now it can be an enlarged version of the patch you've already have, or make something else... Either or, but I want something for the OP. Not only do I want something there, but you deserve credit for all this work.

As to the logo and description, you can go for it, if you want. Whatever you make in that regard I'll add to the OP.

[COLOR="silver"][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

I can try and gain support during squadcast tommorow i guess...

so no help needed with ship making I take?[/QUOTE]

Well any help to get Scott attention is better than nothing. As to getting a Squadcast, shoot KasperVld a PM tomorrow at 2pm. Every should, more the demand the better.

As far as I'm aware of, the rocket aspect is fine, right guys?

[quote name='ZooNamedGames']I think you might have.

Yeah I'd like something to put on the OP, now it can be an enlarged version of the patch you've already have, or make something else... Either or, but I want something for the OP. Not only do I want something there, but you deserve credit for all this work.

As to the logo and description, you can go for it, if you want. Whatever you make in that regard I'll add to the OP. [/QUOTE]


[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/trcM61S.png?1[/IMG]

Larger size artwork[/CENTER]

Yep, I always keep the original files of any artwork plus the revisions. Any older versions of any artwork are just literally a click away. IF you'd prefer a banner, what we could do is keep this image large, as it is, and add a small mission patch for each subsequent mission as a "progress bar." It is not that hard to do, but won't be able to use IMGUR (not really a nice platform anyway).

Put me down as part of "Public Affairs" since that is where graphic arts would fall. And as always, rep is always nice... :cool: Edited November 19, 2015 by adsii1970

[quote name='adsii1970'][CENTER][url]http://i.imgur.com/trcM61S.png?1[/url]

Larger size artwork[/CENTER]

Yep, I always keep the original files of any artwork plus the revisions. Any older versions of any artwork are just literally a click away. IF you'd prefer a banner, what we could do is keep this image large, as it is, and add a small mission patch for each subsequent mission as a "progress bar." It is not that hard to do, but won't be able to use IMGUR (not really a nice platform anyway).

Put me down as part of "Public Affairs" since that is where graphic arts would fall. And as always, rep is always nice... :cool:[/QUOTE]

So far this is enough :) and I'll update things when I can which will be likely be later tonight.

[url]http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/140034-Real-Human-Kerbals[/url]

I finished putting together the more human appearance. I'm going to add more skin tones in the future.

As said in the other thread, will the models become more human in time?

[quote name='ZooNamedGames']As said in the other thread, will the models become more human in time?[/QUOTE]
I honestly don't know. I think the only thing I can really do is change the eyes, but I could try to make a normal map to change it.

[COLOR="silver"][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

[COLOR=#333333]I will see about shrinking the head. I'll see if I can write a plugin for it.[/COLOR]

No, isn't this one more for your signature: [URL]http://i.imgur.com/OHX2n5O.png?1[/URL][/QUOTE]

You know what would be cool? Giving each mission control team their own sig thing- one for FIDO, Booster, etc. I don't know how much work that would take, though.

Also, since our Steam group is Apollo Recreation- Silver, is there any way to add more silver to the sig things? Say, for instance, the writing and border. :)

[quote name='Deadpangod3']
so no help needed with ship making I take?[/QUOTE]

No, we're using FASA as much as possible. However, if you want to join my Booster team, I'd like that. I am currently the only one on the list, and I'll need help when the shift changes start. What is your time zone?

Also, ZNG, I have school on Monday. I won't be able to do anything that day until after 8 PM EST.

Me too. Maybe we could do it on wednesday? I don't know about anyone else, but I'm off then. It can be in the afternoon, though.

[quote name='CliftonM']Me too. Maybe we could do it on wednesday? I don't know about anyone else, but I'm off then. It can be in the afternoon, though.[/QUOTE]

Can't do Wednesday- I'm visiting family. What about this Sunday?

It wouldn't take much work at all. Just a bit of tweaking here and there, getting rid of stuff of the USER UNFRIENDLY IMGUR and replace the older images with newer ones. I don't want to create a lot of confusion...

[quote name='Dman979']Can't do Wednesday- I'm visiting family. What about this Sunday?[/QUOTE]
Would work, but I might have background noise then...

Ok, if I use a metallic silver color, the text becomes unreadable. I've tried using a light grey - similar to light aircraft grey for those of you who use Testors model paint. Still, have the same problem.

If not yellow, then white is the best option. And just because you asked:

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ScH4IiW.png?1[/IMG] or [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EA6MRxL.png?1[/IMG]

We are going to leave the background colors the way they are... Mission Control will have a blue background, flight crew will have a red background, and green for administrative functions not directly mission/launch related.
Remember I have to be there and this upcoming week is a mine field for me. Some days I'm not too busy but others I wont be home until 6. So don't think your the only ones.

I made a Steam account. Could you add me to the group? [url]http://steamcommunity.com/id/cliftonm/[/url]

And Spots open still? I really want to join in on this, it seems really cool.

[quote name='MysteriousSteve']And Spots open still? I really want to join in on this, it seems really cool.[/QUOTE]

Need to update the OP, but some roles are needed. The biggest being CMP. Other than that, we just need people for rotations in the final mission.

You can join, but realize this is a big job. We are all taking this very very seriously but if you can assist, then join, we take all hands.

[quote name='MysteriousSteve']And Spots open still? I really want to join in on this, it seems really cool.[/QUOTE]

YES! There are still spots open. We are looking for a CMP, PAO, or backups for other positions. We intend to run this in shifts, so your timezone would be a help too.
